actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend section 127 of title 23 of the United States Code relating to vehicle weights.

summary.text: Revises the weight limitations of vehicles to prohibit apportioning any funds under the Federal-Aid Highway Act to any State within which the Interstate System may lawfully be used by vehicles with weight in excess of eighteen thousand pounds carried on any one axle, or with a tandem-axle weight in excess of thirty-two thousand pounds, or with an overall gross weight in excess of seventy-three thousand two hundred and eighty pounds.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 127 of title 23 of the United States Code relating to vehicle weights.
